sentences.sContent: The trees formed such a dense canopy that all beneath was a deep carpet of pine needles.
sentences.sCn: 这些树形成了浓密的冠盖，下面是一层厚厚的松针。

phrases.pCn: 郁闭度；林冠密度；林冠郁闭度

words.tran: 用天篷遮盖；遮蔽（canopy的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: a cover made of cloth that is fixed above a bed, seat etc as a decoration or as a shelter
